name: wrap-and-quote-usdc
description: Wrap ETH to WETH and quote the resultant amount of USDC to swap on Uniswap v3

groups.description: Wrap 0.75 ETH to WETH and quote USDC output on Uniswap V3
operations: Wrap 0.75 ETH to WETH using function deposit() of IWETH interface [value: 0.75 ether]

Quote USDC amount for swapping 0.75 WETH using function quoteExactInputSingle(address tokenIn, address tokenOut, uint24 fee, uint256 amountIn, uint160 sqrtPriceLimitX96) of IQuoterV2 interface [tokenIn: 0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2, tokenOut: 0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48, fee: 3000, amountIn: 0.75 ether, sqrtPriceLimitX96: 0] and store the returned amountOut in variable usdcQuote
